title: Message to a Yuletide Party for the Handicapped Children of New York City.
text:
My dear Uncle Robert:

Please give the children my affectionate greetings when they have their party on the Steamship Leviathan on December 24th, and my best wishes for a very Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Uncle Robert, President, Uncle Robert Foundation, Inc., 16 East Fifteenth Street, New York City]
